sen.j: 宝生英照（ほうしょう ふさてる）とは、シテ方宝生流能楽師。
sen.e: Fusateru HOSHO was a Noh actor of the Hosho school of lead actors (shite-kata).
Fusateru HOSHO was a Noh actor of the Hosho school of shite-kata (lead actors).
Fusateru HOSHO was a Noh actor of the Hosho school of shite-kata (lead actors).

sen.j: シテ方宝生流一九世宗家。
sen.e: The 19th head of the Hosho school of lead actors
The 19th head of the Hosho school of shite-kata.
sen.cmt: lead actors→shite-kataとし、ピリオド追加
sen.e: The 19th head of the Hosho school of shite-kata.

sen.j: 十八世宗家宝生英雄の長男。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of Fusao HOSHO, the 18th head of the Hosho school.
He was the eldest son of Fusao HOSHO, the 18th head of the Hosho school.
He was the eldest son of Fusao HOSHO, the 18th head of the Hosho school.
In 1988, he succeeded to the head of the school.
In 1988, he succeeded to the head of the school.
In 1988, he succeeded to the head of the school.

sen.j: 重要無形文化財指定保持者。
sen.e: The holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property
The holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
The holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
Kazufusa HOSHO is his eldest son.
